name: CPGRecommendationDefinition
title: CPG Recommendation Definition
description: Profile of PlanDefinition as a Recommendation Definition for use with CPG Implementation Guide

element.short: Pertinent positives and negatives relevant to determining applicability
element.definition: For recommendation definitions, the input information for an action identifies pertinent positive and negative information relevant to determining the applicability of the recommendation.
element.comment: Note that it may be possible to infer this information directly from the logic involved.

element.short: Pertinent or relevant information that should be included with the recommendation
element.definition: For recommendation definitions, the output element is used to specify what information should be included as patient-specific supporting evidence for the recommendation.
element.comment: If output elements are specified, implementations SHOULD support attaching content matching the output data requirements to the recommendation instances as appropriate for the recommendation resource type, typically a supportingInformation element.
